About Us:

DoingGood is a community of charitable people that get fulfillment by offering their time, talents, Goods and resources for the benefit of their chosen cause.

Charitable organizations are built to support their underlying cause. They rely heavily on volunteers and donors to keep the spirit of their mission alive. At times the daunting task of asking people for more and more weighs heavily upon some organizations. However, most people truly want to help these organizations, but they just don’t know how. DoingGood was developed as an alternative fundraising solution for Organizations that is different from the traditional mailing list and volunteer sign up sheet. DoingGood broadens an Organization’s volunteer base and funding source by offering non-traditional opportunities to volunteers.

DoingGood will assist organizations in finding their supporters by easily connecting those that have something to offer with those that are looking for help.

Our DoingGood platform provides everyday people the opportunity to make a difference. People volunteer for many reasons. Maybe you want to give back to something that has done good for you. Maybe you’re teaching your children moral duty and instilling that it is the “right thing to do”. No matter why you volunteer, you can’t deny that high you feel from doing good for others. DoingGood is the perfect place to go for people that don’t always know what to do, or how they can make a difference.

Join DoingGood for your opportunity to get that feeling of satisfaction.

How We Work:

DoingGood membership is free and allows people that want to donate their time, talents and goods the ability to search help wanted ads and post their offered service or good. Members get to choose what organization their donation benefits and the funds are automatically delivered. Members are also able to purchase the wide variety of goods and services other members are offering while knowing that their money is going to a good cause.

Do you like the mission of DoingGood and want to help keep the DoingGood mission alive? DoingGood is also a non-profit organization, and like all good things, we require funds to keep the website running. If you would like to support DoingGood click here.
